briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Turoctocog Alfa in Previously Treated Male Children With Haemophilia A
officialTitle: A Multi-Centre, Open-Label, Non-Controlled Trial on Safety and Efficacy of N8 in Previously Treated Paediatric Patients With Haemophilia A
summary: This trial is conducted in Asia, Europe, and North and South America. The aim of this clinical trial is to investigate the safety and efficacy of turoctocog alfa (recombinant factor VIII, rFVIII (N8)) in male previously treated paediatric subjects with haemophilia A.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Incidence Rate of FVIII Inhibitors (Greater Than or Equal to 0.6 Bethesda Units (BU))
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: The adverse events were collected throughout the trial, corresponding to an average of 138 days per subject.

effectByArm.arm: All Subjects Treated With Turoctocog Alfa
